      • computeAmortizedShare

        protected static ImmutableList<com.facebook.buck.rules.ScubaBuildListener.CostEntry> computeAmortizedShare(Iterable<? extends BuckEvent> events)
        Helper function for computing how much time each synchronous event took, amortized by the number of threads that were active at that time. For example, if our trace looked like 
         |---Parse (3) ---|
                  |--Compile1 (3) --|
                  |--Compile2 (3) --|
                  |--Compile3 (3) --|
                                    |--Package (3)--|
        This would return 
         { Parse: {amortized: 3, total: 3},
   Compile1: {amortized: 1, total: 3},
   Compile2: {amortized: 1, total: 3},
   Compile3: {amortized: 1, total: 3},
   Package: {amortized: 3, total: 3}}
        Parameters:
        events - The events to be processed. events is required to be sorted by nanotime in ascending order, and two events on the same thread may not overlap.
